[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span(
            1,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    Expression {
        expression: Variable(
            BracedVariableVariable(
                BracedVariableVariable {
                    start: Span(
                        1,
                        7,
                    ),
                    variable: FunctionCall {
                        target: Identifier(
                            SimpleIdentifier(
                                SimpleIdentifier {
                                    span: Span(
                                        1,
                                        9,
                                    ),
                                    value: "foo",
                                },
                            ),
                        ),
                        arguments: ArgumentList {
                            comments: CommentGroup {
                                comments: [],
                            },
                            start: Span(
                                1,
                                12,
                            ),
                            arguments: [],
                            end: Span(
                                1,
                                13,
                            ),
                        },
                    },
                    end: Span(
                        1,
                        14,
                    ),
                },
            ),
        ),
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span(
                1,
                15,
            ),
        ),
    },
]
